name: Wanderer's Fortune
text: The promise of Elysium’s freedom liberates you from all forms of restraint, allowing you to move as you will and to avoid numerous kinds of restraints that would otherwise vex a traveler or explorer.
benefit:
As a swift action, you gain the benefits of freedom of movement until the end of your turn or until you benefit from the effects to escape a grapple or magical restraint, whichever comes first.

You can use this feat’s benefit once per day, plus an additional time per day for every 5 ranks you have in Knowledge (planes).
text_zh: 来自极乐境的自由誓言让你能够从各式的制约中解放出来，让你可以随心所欲地行动，避免各种会让旅行者与探险者困扰的限制。
benefit_zh:
以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得行动自如法术的好处，持续到你的回合结束或你籍此逃脱了擒抱或法术限制为止，以较先发生者为准。

你可以使用并获得本专长的好处每天一次，在知识（位面）上每有5级额外增加一次。
